content: found an error there is a new version now this is my go to vanilla sock pattern top down 2x2 rib traditional heel flaps and gusset with options for heel stitch or eye of partridge heel flaps and instructions for high instep adjustments and round toe **materials ** bugbear woolens gemstone sock yarn 75% superwash merino 25% nylon 463 yards 401 meters / 100 grams **needles ** us 1/ 2 25 mm your choice of dpns two circulars or one long circular to work in the round **notions ** tapestry needle stitch markers optional **gauge ** 32 sts 44 rnds = 4 inches 10 cm over stockinette stitch in the round **size ** women s small medium large to fit 7 8 9 inches/18 20 23 cm foot circumference foot length is adjustable socks shown measure 9
